blueprint.description: Git CLI) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [gitsome](https://github.com/donnemartin/gitsome) is a supercharged Git/GitHub command line interface (CLI), with official integration for GitHub and GitHub Enterprise. It aims to supercharge your standard git/shell interface by focusing on improving ease-of-use and increasing productivity. It is compatible (and integrates well with) [gh](https://gitlab.com/megabyte-labs/ansible-roles/gh), GitHub's official CLI.
blueprint.name: gitsome
blueprint.title: gitsome
